The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.

* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.

* Full Version *

This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:

- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.

* How to Use *

To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:

- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).

The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.

We don’t blame you for falling asleep on the couch occasionally, so we’ve got you covered with handy alarms and reminders. Keeping track of diapers is also imperative to keeping your baby healthy. Everyone needs an easy way to check how often they’re changing diapers, and if everything looks normal during each change.

Check your baby’s day to day activities easily and efficiently. This baby care app will help you keep track of everything in one convenient place and help moms take care of themselves by having a peace of mind.

Blood pressure monitor & heart rate tracker app - Our application does not measure blood pressure. The app allows you to track it. For measurement use, FDA-approved blood pressure monitors.

App Main Features:
 
- Modern and user-friendly interface
- High blood pressure control
- Clear graphs
- Measurement history
- Reminders and notifications

Blood Pressure Levels:

Normal: Systolic 90-119 and Diastolic 60-79
Hypotension: Systolic 90 and less or Diastolic 60 and less
Elevated: Systolic 120-129 and Diastolic 60-80
Hypertension - Stage 1: Systolic 130-139 or Diastolic 80-90
Hypertension - Stage 2: Systolic 140-180 or Diastolic 90-120
Hypertensive: Systolic 180 and higher or Diastolic 120 and higher

Aging Adults:

In adults, systolic blood pressure rises from early adulthood onward, up to at least age 70. Diastolic pressure tends to begin to rise at the same time but starts to fall earlier in mid-life, approximately age 55. Mean blood pressure rises from early adulthood, plateauing in mid-life, while pulse pressure rises quite markedly after the age of 40.

Consequently, in many older people, systolic blood pressure often exceeds the normal adult range. The rise in pulse pressure with age is attributed to increased stiffness of the arteries.

Stay healthy!

The #1 medical simulation on the App Store!  Full Code challenges you to take on complex clinical cases in a realistic 3D emergency room.  Whether you are a medical student, resident, paramedic, nurse, PA or experienced physician you will enjoy the challenge of solving Full Code cases.  Our library includes over 105 scenarios with a mix of common occurrences, trauma cases, pediatric cases, life-threatening illnesses and obscure diseases that you may only see once or twice in your career.  We add 2 new scenarios each month and we frequently cover clinical hot-topics.  Earn CME credit hours with realistic medical simulation.

CLINICAL PRACTICE
Begin by taking a history and performing a physical exam, then click on equipment in the virtual resuscitation bay to order tests and perform interventions. Choose amongst a host of drugs, bedside tests, labs, and imaging to help you narrow the differential diagnosis.  Our physiology engine will change the vitals based on your interventions and the patient’s condition just as they would in real life.  While you zero in on the final diagnosis and definitively treat the patient you can consult with specialists and nursing staff for assistance, but the patient’s survival rests in your hands.  

PERSONALIZED ASSESSMENT
At the end of each case, you receive a score in six core clinical competencies to guide your continuing education.  Run through the case as many times as you like to improve your score and hone your resuscitation skills.  After each attempt you have the choice of revealing partial answers which can give you valuable insight into the correct diagnosis.  By revealing the full case answer you gain access to our detailed debrief notes which walk you through each case’s essential diagnostic and therapeutic interventions required to save the patient.  Finally, we provide you with further reading through high-quality relevant web-links and references related to each case.

CASE DESIGN 
The Full Code team prioritizes environmental fidelity in every case and we strive to replicate the complexity of managing critically ill patients from presentation to disposition.  The medical content of each case is created by our team of emergency physicians lead by James Kimo Takayesu, a Harvard faculty member and ED attending at Massachusetts General Hospital with 15 years of experience training emergency medicine residents. He has received 16 teaching awards in his career for educational innovation and bedside teaching. Each case is peer reviewed twice, and our team continuously updates our clinical content to reflect the best in clinical and educational practice.

When a family member or a friend has diabetes, you want to be supportive and stay close.  You might want to know if their glucose levels go too high or too low, be able to quickly and easily access their insulin pump and Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) system information. 
 
With the CareLink™ Connect app, now you can remotely see their glucose levels and insulin pump information wherever you are, so you can know how they are doing.

The CareLink™ Connect app helps you quickly accomplish these tasks: 
Let you securely view glucose levels, graphs, and trends
Sends you high or low glucose levels notifications, so you can be informed and supportive
Shows you the status of the insulin pump system, for greater peace of mind

To remotely view pump system information, family members or friends need to install the CareLink™ Connect app on their compatible mobile device. Also, the person with diabetes needs a MiniMed™ 700-series insulin pump, the MiniMed™ Mobile app installed on a compatible mobile device, which then should be connected online to the CareLink™ software. To find a list of compatible devices, please visit your local Medtronic website. 

IMPORTANT NOTE: In order to receive real-time updates, the app needs to continuously receive data from the CareLink™ servers, and the insulin pump system needs to sync with the CareLink™ servers through the MiniMed™ Mobile app. The CareLink™ Connect app only works with the MiniMed™ 700-series insulin pump systems; it currently does not support other standalone CGM systems, MiniMed™ or Paradigm™ insulin pumps. 

The CareLink™ Connect app is intended to provide a secondary display of insulin pump and CGM (Continuous Glucose Monitoring) system data on a supported mobile device. CareLink™ Connect app is not intended to replace the real-time display of insulin pump or CGM data on the primary display device. All therapy decisions should be based on the primary display device.

CareLink™ Connect app is not intended to analyze or modify the insulin pump and CGM data that it receives. Nor is it intended to control any function of the insulin pump or CGM system to which it is connected. CareLink™ Connect app is not intended to receive information directly from the insulin pump or CGM system.

This app store should not be used as your first point of contact to resolve technical or customer services issues. In order to protect your privacy and personal information, and promptly resolve any technical or customer services issues you are having with any Medtronic product, please contact the local Medtronic support line. 

Medtronic may be required to actively contact customers regarding complaints related to products. If Medtronic determines that your comment or complaint requires follow-up, a Medtronic team member will attempt to contact you to collect more information.

©2021 Medtronic. All rights reserved. Medtronic, Medtronic logo and Further, Together are trademarks of Medtronic. Third party brands are trademarks of their respective owners.

Mobilna aplikacija „Pomozimo zajedno“ omogućuje povezivanje osoba koje se nalaze u kriznim situacijama zbog iznenadnih i teških zdravstvenih poteškoća sa stručnim osobama koje pružaju savjetovanje i podršku u stvarnom vremenu, kakobi oboljeli i članovi njihovih obitelji dobili stručnu podršku i savjete za savladavanje prvotnog šoka i stresa te administrativnu i organizacijsku podršku pri dolasku na liječenje u Zagreb, daleko od svoga doma. Aplikacija omogućava pružanje digitalnih online usluga: savjetovanja, psihološke podrške, podnošenje zahtjeva za uslugu kod pružatelja usluge ili u domu korisnika, pomoć pri organizaciji života tijekom liječenja daleko od doma, u Zagrebu ili u inozemstvu. Aplikacija nudi savjetovanje i podršku putem poruke, telefonskim putem kao i mogućnost zadavanja zahtjeva za primanje usluge uživo u kapacitetima humanitarne udruge „fra Mladen Hrkać“ ili u vlastitom domu korisnika. Unutar same aplikacije se evidentiraju podaci o korisnicima te o tijeku njihova liječenja i oporavka, što će stručnim osobama omogućiti praćenje psihofizičkog stanja oboljele osobe i članova obitelji. Time se osigurava priprema kvalitetnog individualnog pristupa u pružanju podrške. Osim toga, jedna od funkcija aplikacijeje i prikupljanje povratnih informacija o kvaliteti usluge. Sami korisnici usluge mogu dati svoje prijedloge za poboljšanje usluga a samim tim i kvalitete usluga. Osjećaj sigurnosti je vrlo važan i ključan segment u najtežim trenutcima njihovih života – kada saznaju da oni sami ili netko od članova njihovih obitelji boluje od teške bolesti te da je oboljeli primoran liječiti se daleko od vlastitoga doma. Kroz aplikaciju je moguće dobiti sve informacije i interaktivno se upoznati sa svime štoih čeka na liječenju daleko od doma kao i sve vrste usluga koje im humanitarna udruga „fra Mladen Hrkać“ pri tom može pružiti. Zahvaljujući tehnologiji i aplikaciji dojam koji ostaje na korisnicima izaziva sigurnost i vjeru u pozitivan ishod. Pri tome, u stvarnom vremenu korisnici mogu uputiti kontakt i poruku stručnim suradnicima u Udruzi koji će riješiti sve njihove sumnje, nedoumice i pomoći im u organizaciji liječenja daleko od doma. Osim podrške u prvim trenutcima, interakcija kroz aplikaciju odvija se tijekom cijelog boravka na liječenju daleko od doma. Pored pružanja digitalnih socijalnih usluga pripadnicima ranjivih skupina, mobilna aplikacija unaprjeđuje informacijsko-komunikacijske odnose sa volonterima, ustanovama socijalne skrbi i ostalim institucijama, srodnim organizacijama civilnog društva, donatorima, medijima i širom javnosti. Svi oni doprinose izgradnji društva koje je osviješteno osocijalnim rizicima teško oboljelih osoba i osoba s invaliditetom i uz to se educiraju o načinima pružanja podrške takvim osobama s ciljem lakše integracije u zajednicu. Aplikacija omogućuje prijavu svih zainteresiranih osoba koje žele volontirati. U samo par koraka im omogućuje da postanu dio naše velike volonterske obitelji. Donatori osiguravaju sredstva za rad i pružanje socijalnih usluga. Bez podrške donatora ne bi bili u mogućnosti pružiti sve usluge i pomoći toliki broj osoba. Krozaplikaciju su dostupni podaci za doniranje i načine pomoći za donatore iz cijelog svijeta. Stručnu podršku putem mobilne aplikacije pružaju djelatnici i suradnici humanitarne udruge „fra Mladen Hrkać“, socijalni radnik, psiholog, psihijatar i pedagog. Digitalna online podrška od posebnog je značaja za osobe u ruralnim, potpomognutim i otočnim područjima kojima je pristup socijalnim uslugama i podršci, zbog nepovoljnog geografskog i gospodarskog položaja, ograničen.Izradu mobilne aplikacije „Pomozimo zajedno“ je sufinanciralo Ministarstvo za demografiju, obitelj, mlade i socijalnu politiku kroz projekt „Mobilna aplikacija za pomoć i podršku tijekom suočavanja sa bolesti“ u sklopu Natječaja za dodjelu jednokratnih financijskih podrški za 2019. godinu.

Is that skin spot normal or cancerous? 

* Over 3 million skin checks - 50K+ skin cancers detected * 
SkinVision is a medical service that provides a reliable skin assessment in 30 seconds.

Skin checks with our clinically validated technology are affordable and potentially covered by your health insurance provider. You can buy a single risk assessment or purchase unlimited checks to effectively monitor your moles for 3 or 12 months (no subscription). 

You can use some features of SkinVision for free including our risk profile and skin type quizzes, storing images of your moles and accessing UV information in your area. 

Skin cancer is a global and growing problem. It's estimated that 1 in 5 people will develop it in their lifetime. More people are diagnosed with skin cancer each year than all other cancers combined. 

Early detection is key to prevention and timely treatment. In fact, over 95% of skin cancers can be successfully treated if they are found early. This is why dermatologists recommend performing skin checks every 3 to 6 months. Now you can do this simply with SkinVision on your smartphone. 

Our checks use an algorithm to assess your mole or skin spot for cancerous signs. Our service is quality assured by our team of dermatology experts. Our users have received more than 3.5 million risk assessments and we’ve found over 50,000 cases of melanoma and other types of skin cancer. 

The SkinVision app is a regulated medical device with European CE marking. We care about your privacy and are ISO certified for information security and medical device management. SkinVision is trusted by insurance companies worldwide for the early detection of skin cancer. SkinVision has partnerships with leading health insurers, cancer clinics and research universities in the United Kingdom, Australia, Germany, the Netherlands, and New Zealand.

More than 2 million people use SkinVision to monitor their moles and skin spots. 

WHY SKINVISION?

Monitoring spots can help you to detect skin cancer at an early stage when it’s more likely to be treatable. By using SkinVision, you can:

Check your skin for signs of skin cancer anytime, anywhere. Dermatologists recommend checking your skin spots at least every 3 months.
Receive a risk indication of your mole or skin spot within 60 seconds.
Store your photos to help monitor changes over time and easily share them with your doctor.
Learn about your skin and get advice based on your skin type and risk profile.

¿Qué es el Portal del Paciente?
El portal del paciente es un espacio personal desde el que podrá acceder a su historial médico, pruebas diagnósticas, informes clínicos, gestionar sus citas médicas y tener un seguimiento sin esperas ni desplazamientos.
Está destinada a los pacientes de los centros del grupo Quirónsalud, o a cualquier nuevo usuario que desee darse de alta como nuevo paciente.
El grupo Quirónsalud se preocupa de su salud y bienestar, por ello ha lanzado esta aplicación con la intención de acercar y estrechar la relación paciente médico para poder proporcionarle un servicio de mayor calidad.
Las funcionalidades principales de esta App son:
- Solicitar cita previa permitiendo consultar los huecos disponibles para cada médico, y así usted poder elegir el que mejor le convenga.
- Consultar las citas concertadas, pudiendo modificar la fecha y hora o incluso cancelarla si fuese necesario.
- Notificaciones y recordatorio de citas
- Consultar y cumplimentar las posibles tareas pendientes que su médico haya programado para usted, cómo pedir cita online, o rellenar formularios que luego serán revisados por su médico.
- Consultar los resultados de sus pruebas sin necesidad de tener que desplazarse a su centro médico. Podrá descargar y consultar los informes directamente desde su móvil.
- Consultar y visualizar imágenes diagnósticas
- Consultar sus informes clínicos e históricos de formularios realizados pudiendo filtrar los resultados por fecha, o especialidad entre otros.

Worry less about your blood sugar! 
 
The Diabits app is a personalized diabetes management tool made by Bio Conscious for people with type I and type II diabetes. Using a machine learning algorithm, the Diabits app builds a personalized model of your blood sugar. The model gives you estimates of your blood sugar up to 60 minutes ahead of time to help you better understand how different stimulus impact your blood sugar trends, and how to better avoid highs and lows. 

Take advantage of the most accurate and most sophisticated insights available for diabetes management. 
 
The Diabits app is the perfect companion app for users of Dexcom continuous glucose monitors (CGMs), or Nightscout.
 
Use the Diabits app to:
1) See your future glucose fluctuations 60 minutes ahead of time.
2) Stay informed throughout the day to avoid highs and lows. 
3) Keep your loved ones in the loop by allowing them to see your blood sugar data and notifications.
 
Other features:
Follower check-in
Journaling 
Analytics and insights
Critical alerts
Apple health integration
 
Requires:
Dexcom G4 (with Share), Dexcom G5, Dexcom G6 or Nightscout 
 
For greater personalization of your blood sugar estimates, connect Fitbit or Apple Watch.
 
Stay up to date:
www.diabits.com
 
This application is not owned by, or affiliated with Dexcom.
 
The Diabits app ("the app") is designed to demonstrate the potential value of estimating blood sugar in order to assist with diabetes management.  The estimates of blood sugar in the Diabits app should only be considered in direct conjunction with the data from your continuous glucose monitor ("CGM").  Always refer to the measurement made by your CGM before making any corrections with food, insulin, or otherwise.  Do not use the Diabits app to determine insulin dose, or to control an insulin pump or other sort of insulin delivery system.  The Diabits app is not intended to replace any self-monitoring practices, or other treatment methods prescribed by your primary care provider.  The data displayed in the Diabits app, including the blood sugar estimates, the measured value, or any other details about your blood sugar trends should not be taken as fact.  Only your CGM itself may be considered a fully accurate source from which to view or receive data from your CGM.  The estimates in the Diabits app are made by a machine learning algorithm and may or may not be representative of your actual blood sugar in the future.  The machine learning model which powers the Diabits app takes between three and seven days to learn your personal physiology, and will become more accurate with continued use.  The Diabits app, by default, sets the low boundary of your target range at 70 mg/dL or 3.9 mmol/L.  The high boundary is set at 180 mg/dL or 10 mmol/L.  You may change these values at any time, and should set your target range boundaries based on the recommendation of your primary care provider.  
 
Please review our privacy policy: https://www.bioconscious.tech/privacy
and Terms of Service: https://www.bioconscious.tech/diabits-terms
if you have any further questions.

Purpose of the EULAR School of Rheumatology is to combine all its educational offers, from live courses and online courses to books or webinars, under one roof. The European League Against Rheumatism (EULAR) is the organisation which represents the people with arthritis/rheumatism, health professional and scientific societies of rheumatology of all the European nations. The aims of EULAR are to reduce the burden of rheumatic diseases on the individual and society and to improve the treatment, prevention and rehabilitation of musculoskeletal diseases. To this end, EULAR fosters excellence in education and research in the field of rheumatology. It promotes the translation of research advances into daily care and fights for the recognition of the needs of people with musculoskeletal diseases by the governing bodies in Europe.

This application was developed under the auspices of the EULAR School of Rheumatology. The purpose of the application is to provide information and guidelines on rheumatic and muskuloskeletal diseases for use by rheumatologists, other medical doctors and health professionals in rheumatology as support in their everyday work. It is EULAR's aim with this app to make available a most comprehensive tool including recommendations, OML, an imaging library, classification criteria for RMDs, as well as useful external links and a EULAR pocket primer on rheumatic diseases, all accessible from any location (online and off-line).

The myMerlinPulse™ mobile application for patients is intended for use by people who have an Abbott Medical implanted heart device and access to a mobile device. The app provides remote monitoring capability of the device by transmitting information from the patient’s implanted heart device to the patient’s healthcare provider.

The App uses an internet connection through a WiFi or cellular network to send information about your implanted heart device to your healthcare provider. Your information is encrypted to ensure the privacy and security of the transmission. 

The app’s intuitive user-friendly interface allows you to check if your heart device is connected with your doctor, get information about your heart device including its battery status, view the history of transmissions and send manual transmissions to your healthcare provider, and be notified if there has been a significant change in the performance of your implanted device.

This app will only function once paired with your implanted device.

This app does not currently support tablet devices.

Do not rely on the app during a medical emergency. If you experience a medical emergency, seek medical attention immediately.
